scripts.kill-emulators: lsof -i:5001,8080,9099,9199 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r kill -9 || true
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:types" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix apps/backend/functions" "firebase emulators:start --only functions"
scripts.build: npm run build:types && concurrently "npm run build:frontend" "npm run build:backend"
